item.description:
Pierrot Bistrot (sic) is a fine discovery. Located on Cambridge St on "the other side" of Beacon Hill, this little place aims to please. The food is all good, as are the wines, and the service too. Entrees are $19 - 24.

http://www.pierrotbis...

Parking is difficult. If you can, take the T and get off at Charles St. It's only a few blocks up Cambridge St.

NOTE! Don't believe the map that is linked at the top of this page. It would have you go to Chestnut Hill!

If you must cancel, be sure to do so by internet at least twelve hours in advance, or else by phone (781)643-0130. Please don't be a no-show as there are consequences, and not just to your kharma.
item.how_to_find_us: The restaurant is small, but can always ask the hostess.
item.why: The Pierrot Bistrot serves amazing French food at great prices. Feel in the mood for French? Join us!
item.name: Pierrot Bistrot
